mapper.insert: insert into staff( staff_id, enterprise_id, staff_name, staff_password, staff_nickname, staff_head, staff_phoneNumber, staff_address, staff_card) values( #{staff_id}, #{enterprise_id}, #{staff_name}, #{staff_password}, #{staff_nickname}, #{staff_head}, #{staff_phoneNumber}, #{staff_address}, #{staff_card})
mapper.update: update staff set enterprise_id=#{enterprise_id} where staff_id=#{id}
update staff set staff_name=#{name} where staff_id=#{id}
update staff set staff_password=#{psw} where staff_id=#{id}
update staff set staff_nickname=#{nickname} where staff_id=#{id}
update staff set staff_head=#{head} where staff_id=#{id}
update staff set staff_phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber} where staff_id=#{id}
